data.text: @drraghibali Covid cases in the over 55s now soaring. The foolish lifting of sensible restrictions such as facemasks and social distancing has left the elderly and the clinically extremely vulnerable at huge risk: https://t.co/26LcfTY6nT

@drraghibali Just to be clear, are you saying the NHS has ramped up non emergency admissions (eg elective surgeries) over last 2 weeks & that might be an explanation?

Hope it’s not increase in nosocomial transmission due to relaxed procedures (as someone with immunosuppressed family member).

@drraghibali Oh, I'll be complacent all right.

I will not follow any public health guidelines, I couldn't care less if I catch this virus or if I transmit it, sorry.

Those who wish to take precautions are welcome to do so.

I'm done.
@drraghibali What is this Omicron ba2 variant about? Picking up on various feeds that it is driving up cases.
@drraghibali Who the hell are still testing for a cold?? 🤦‍♀️

@drraghibali @SteveBakerHW Perhaps if you inform the public they’ve increased their risk by a large percent when wearing masks, stop that in hospitals altogether & start using ‘science’ again… https://t.co/gtf2XGNzAt
